entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
